author: bmwlego
title: Lime Green Parts a Plus!
review: This was one of three sets included in a Brickmaster mailing and it was the best of the three in my mind. The front of the car looks unfinished because you can see studs but other than that, this is a nice set. The white slopes in the back are great parts as is the windshield slope. The lime green parts are nice and this was a fun set to build. Another good set to come with a Brickmaster subscription.

author: Rgijaba
title: le mans, eh? wheres le womans?
review: le mans is a fun 'lil racer, and its fairly fast, and the white and green clor shceme is nice, as well. its got a certan charm, and im happy when ever i look at it! its wheels are nice and rather rare by todays standerds. it has some nice siver parts, as well, and they seem to be some sorta engine (spelled wrong), and it has a nice, sleek form. get it if you can!

author: hustla187
title: Nice Supercar
review: This is an unique Tiny Turbo because of the lime green pieces and it looks like a Mercedes CLK GTR or a Maserati MC-12. The clear piece is very cool too. This Tiny Turbo is one of the best in a long time.

author: legoguy_3000_
title: Weird name
review:
I got this free with the newspaper.

Pros:
stands up well
good colour scheme
good for a promo
easy to build
weird name

Cons:
no alternate models
small instructions,could get lost
wheels pick up dust

very good for a promo 4/5

author: Challengestradale
title: One of the best
review:
This is a benchmark, this is one of the prettiest and best racers sets ever.

PROS
- looks
- easy to build
- fun to play with

CONS
- none

This is a great addition to your tiny turbo sets, and is a brilliant set.
